QuestData.Title: Taming a Talbuk
QuestData.Description: The next beast is one of the fastest in Draenor, but will test your skills at infiltrating into enemy territory.$B$BThe young talbuk can be found on the flowery hills of Shadowmoon Valley. Take this talbuk lasso and head out.$B$BWhen you encounter one, mount up and throw this rope, then follow it until it is tamed. Good hunting!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Talbuk Lasso on a Young Silverpelt and follow it until it is tamed.
